recipe.name: Man-Style BBQ Sauce
recipe.notes: I'd hope "Man-Style" meant, like, macho.  I think instead its a pejorative along the lines of "basic," "bachelor," or "student"; suggesting one is somehow getting by with what's onhand rather than invoking True, Refined Cooking.Whatever.  Its a handy recipe that can be created with common ingredients.  Surprisingly better than one would imagine.
recipe.preparation: Mix ingredients and refrigerate prior to use.
recipe.source_name: From "Sharing Our Favorites: the Dana Guild, Senshin Buddhist Church, Los Angeles, CA" -- Kiyome Hirayama
